function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential challenge to privacy due to software applications for risk identification","Impact":"Privacy concerns and potential data breaches","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict data protection measures and privacy policies","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization, and secure data storage","People":"Users of the risk identification software","Owner":"Developers and administrators of the risk identification software"},{"Description":"Viral activity inside buildings posing a risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious disease transmission among occupants","Mitigation":"Improvement of building shell elements to reduce viral activity","Technologies":"Advanced glazing, skylights, and bioclimatic design","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building designers and architects"},{"Description":"Lack of natural light and ventilation in buildings impacting public health","Impact":"Deterioration of public health conditions due to lack of natural light and ventilation","Mitigation":"Improvement of access to natural light and ventilation in buildings","Technologies":"Windows, skylights, and ventilation systems","People":"General public","Owner":"Building owners and administrators"}]}
